oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interview with Muḥammad al-Khaṭīb
مقابلة مع محمد الخطيب
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arabic fiction--Palestine
Folk poetry, Arabic
ʻAtābā--Palestine
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: al-Khāliṣah (Palestine); Arab tribes; Chivalry; Courage; Cousins; Daughters; Defeat; Dowry; Horses; Kings; Knights; Love; Marriage; National anthem; Palestinian resistance; Princes; Travel; Arab tribes; Attack; Deception; Defeat; Engagement; Imprisonment; Kings; Knights; Marriage; Martyrdom; Muḥammad, Prophet, 571-633, Prayers; Murder; Muslims; Rebellion; ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, Caliph, 600-661?; Arab tribes; Brides; Love; Muḥammad, Prophet, 571-633, Prayers; Princes; Wedding songs; Daughters; Dīwān; Egypt; Kings; Traders
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSFAR: الحسين، كامل (زعيم قرية); الحسين، كامل (زعيم قرية).
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on February 12, 1996 with Muḥammad al-Khaṭīb, male, born in 1920 in al-Khāliṣah, Palestine and resides in ʻAyn al-Ḥilwah Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع محمد الخطيب في 12 شباط فبراير عام 1996، ذكر، ولد عام 1920 في الخالصة، فلسطين ويقيم في مخيم عين الحلوة للاجئين الفلسطنيين، لبنان.
